release.change: Breaking Change: All attributes for geocoded location sensor are now lower case and spaces have been replaced with an underscore
Add permissions needed to initiate a phone call using command_activity
Add new setting screen to change sensor update frequency
Add pinch to zoom setting under Companion App so users can zoom in the frontend, default value is off.
Add volume up & down functionality to media player widget
Allow camera widget to be reconfigurable
Add new notification feature to open Notification History from action and clickAction
Add new setting to enable WebView remote debugging
Add new setting for persistent connection only when on home WiFi
Enhance command_ble_transmitter to allow for changing advertise mode and transmit power
Replace widget error message with a icon in the widget to indicate the failure
